attributes.action: allow registered keepers of a motor vehicle the basic human right to remain silent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why am I as the registerd keeper of a car not allowed to, when faced with a notice of compliance (asked who the driver of the was at a time of offence) the right to remain silent!

If some one was murdered with a gun and I was the registered keeper of said gun I would not be sent a form asking me to name the user of the gun and if I did not I would be charged with the offence.

It is my basic human right to remain silent and be innocent till proven guilty but this here is not the case!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
